data.title: Auburn Hills Places To Stay
data.meta_description: Aug 28, 2024 - Rent from people in Auburn Hills, MI from € 18/night. Find unique places to stay with local hosts in 191 countries. Belong anywhere with Airbnb.
data.text:
Guest suite in White Lake charter Township

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 205 reviews4.99 (205)

White Lake Studio Apartment-Gateway to Nature

New studio apartment with separate entrance. Fully furnished kitchen, new Queen sized bed, all new furnishings including desk area, Wi-Fi, lots of storage space, new refrigerator, stove, microwave, 42" TV, and dishwasher. Unit includes your own washer and dryer and has a gorgeous lake view in front. Located close to movie theaters, bowling, restaurants, shopping malls, grocery stores, large state recreational park, skiing and convenient to airports. Bathroom inside unit with 2 recliner chairs

Guest suite in Pontiac

4.9 out of 5 average rating, 114 reviews4.9 (114)

Economic & Newly Furnished Duplex in Pontiac

Welcome to "The Hudson House" Central location close to highways, hospitals, new Amazon facility, auto headquarters. It is great for auto employees and medical staff. It is a 2nd floor private upper duplex, complete with dining room, living room, kitchen, bedroom and a private entrance. Recently updated bathroom and furnishings, it has all that you need for a great stay. Security cameras outside and common entry areas. Please note there are rooster's on nearby properties. You may hear them.

Home in Ferndale

4.99 out of 5 average rating, 167 reviews4.99 (167)

Little Yellow House in Ferndale! Quiet, Cozy 3BR

FERNDALE FAVORITE!! Walk to downtown! All new furniture / decor, luxury bedding, memory foam beds, quartz countertops… super clean & well-cared for. This comfy, freshly updated house is on a quiet street just blocks from restaurants, bars, coffee shops & more. Centrally located w/ easy access to freeways, 10-15 min drive to other downtown areas (Royal Oak, Detroit, Birmingham). Ideal for couples, business travelers, LGBTQ+, and families with children. We also allow SMALL pets (under 20 lbs).

Home in Auburn Hills

4.87 out of 5 average rating, 127 reviews4.87 (127)

Spacious Farmhouse with Breakfast - Ella's Place

Right by Rochester Hills downtown! Off of 75 and M59! 12 minutes from DTE center! 7 minutes from Great Lakes Crossing! 30 minutes from downtown Detroit! Walking distance from OU! Come relax in my Auburn Hills home! A modern interior with an elegant space will make your time here wonderful! Whether it's a family vacation, romantic getaway, or business travel, this home has everything you need. Wind down with a jetted bathtub. Create an exquisite meal. Host an event. Enjoy yourself!

Tiny home in Commerce Charter Township

4.91 out of 5 average rating, 135 reviews4.91 (135)

Omega Bed and Breakfast

Omega B & B, built in 2023, is a private, two-story, tiny home on the property of the hosts. Perfect for two, it features a full kitchen, living area, work area and murphy bed (for additional guests) on the top floor. The main bedroom, bathroom, laundry and coffee/wine bar are on the lower level. Guests need to be able to navigate steps both inside and outside the home. There is a parking space for one car. More parking is available, if needed. Check out local attractions online.

Rental unit in Brandon Township

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 130 reviews4.97 (130)

Cozy Boho Apt Close to Pine Knob & Mt Holly

New owners! Enjoy this cozy, peaceful 1 bed/1 bath apartment in downtown Ortonville. 18 minute drive to Pine Knob Music Theater (DTE). 17 minutes to Oxford. 14 minutes to downtown Clarkston. Walking distance to shops/restaurants in downtown Ortonville. Fully equipped kitchen, Wi-Fi, Smart TV, and free parking on premises. One king bed and one large sectional that can sleep two people. Great for singles, couples, or small families. Feel right at home in this updated, clean, modern space.

Rental unit in Ferndale

4.95 out of 5 average rating, 679 reviews4.95 (679)

Wonderful Downtown Ferndale Apt**Superb Location**

Cheerful, charming & eclectic with lots of character, the fully private 1 bedroom 4 room apartment with kitchenette is set in the heart of metro Detroit's coolest urban enclave, award winning downtown Ferndale. A coffee shop is a minutes walk away, 10 restaurants/gastropubs are within a 2 min walk , 50 within a 5 min walk. Just a mile from Detroit with easy access to freeways, 15 minutes to midtown & downtown. Don't miss your chance to stay at Oakland county's most popular Airbnb!

Guest suite in Clarkston

4.97 out of 5 average rating, 622 reviews4.97 (622)

Private Lake House Suite

Very nice private suite in lake house on col de sac at private lake in our home. If you like peace and quiet in nature setting this is it. Property is on a hillside, so guests are required to use steps and slanted walkways. We live above the suite and would like to share this beautiful place with you. Close proximity 15 minutes or less to: Pine Knob Music Theatre, Pine Knob Ski Resort, Chrysler Head Quarter (FCA), Great Lakes Crossings Mall, BROSE, BorgWarner etc.

Guest suite in Springfield Township

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 383 reviews4.96 (383)

Cozy Apartment in our Log Home.

Trim Pines is the perfect small space for a quiet stay and is enjoyed by guests in every season. Our lower one room walk-out is comfortable for 1 to 2 people for short or long term stays. It is a great place to unwind and relax. This tranquility is located 8 miles from I-75 in Davisburg, Michigan. Our guests enjoy local festivals and concerts at Pine Knob Music Theater, golf at nearby courses and biking and hiking at local County, Metro and State Parks.

Home in Harrison Township

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 131 reviews4.96 (131)

Lake St. Clair Boathouse

HOT TUB IS OPEN AND HOT YEAR ROUND! (YES EVEN WINTER!) Cozy canal home on beautiful Lake St. Clair! Keep your boats out of the elements in the huge covered boathouse (27' & 25') or on the 60 foot seawall (with electricity and water!). Park your trucks and trailers on site! Located just around the corner from Lake St. Clair Metro Park. Light a fire and relax in the BRAND NEW hot tub or dual rainfall shower after a long day of fishing!

Cottage in White Lake charter Township

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 324 reviews4.94 (324)

Quiet Cottage on Cooley Lake

Beautiful lake cottage nestled on Cooley Lake is powered by the sun. You can be too in this nearby getaway. We are the first house off the lake on a short canal. Come get away for a night or longer and take in the lake life in one of our kayaks, canoe, paddle-board or fishing gear - all included.. We have many wonderful restaurants nearby or use the grocery nearby and make meals in the fully furnished kitchen.

Home in Ferndale

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 110 reviews4.93 (110)

Entire home in Ferndale

In town for a game, work or to visit loved ones? This fully fenced Fabulous Ferndale home is just one block from historic Woodward Avenue, walking distance to downtown Ferndale bars, restaurants & festivals, 5 minutes from the Detroit Zoo, 15 minutes from downtown Detroit, Detroit Tigers Stadium, Ford Field, Little Caesars Arena & 25 minutes from the Detroit Metro Airport.
